summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing media speculation regarding an FBI investigation. Epstein dismisses the claims as unfounded but acknowledges their potential to generate public interest. The email highlights the confidential nature of the communication and suggests a level of concern regarding the implications of the investigation.
